title: Police: 4 Shot In North Minneapolis, Suspects Sought
content:
MINNEAPOLIS (WCCO) — Authorities are looking for suspects after as many as four people were shot Sunday night in north Minneapolis.
The Minneapolis Police Department was called at about 9:20 p.m. to the area 8th Ave. N. and Humboldt Avenue N. on a report of a fight. While responding to the call, the incident had elevated to a report of shots fired.
When officers arrived, one woman had been shot and was injured. She was taken by ambulance to a hospital with non-life threatening injuries.
Authorities say three other adults had also been shot and were self-transported to hospitals, all with non-life threatening injuries. Police say no arrests have been made in connection with the incident, which is under investigation.
